name: agilevibecoding-docs
description: AVC Framework Documentation - VitePress documentation site

scripts.docs:sync: cp README.md _docs/index.md && cp COMMANDS.md _docs/commands.md && cp INSTALL.md _docs/install.md && cp CONTRIBUTING.md _docs/contribute.md && mkdir -p _docs/ceremonies && cp ceremonies/*.md _docs/ceremonies/ && mkdir -p _docs/agents && cp src/cli/agents/*.md _docs/agents/ && sed -i 's|](README.md#|](/#|g' _docs/commands.md && sed -i 's|](COMMANDS.md)|](/commands)|g' _docs/install.md _docs/contribute.md && sed -i 's|](INSTALL.md)|](/install)|g' _docs/commands.md _docs/contribute.md && sed -i 's|](CONTRIBUTING.md)|](/contribute)|g' _docs/install.md && sed -i 's|](ceremonies/|](/ceremonies/|g' _docs/index.md
scripts.docs:watch: while true; do BEFORE=$(stat -c %Y README.md COMMANDS.md INSTALL.md CONTRIBUTING.md ceremonies/*.md src/cli/agents/*.md 2>/dev/null | md5sum); sleep 1; AFTER=$(stat -c %Y README.md COMMANDS.md INSTALL.md CONTRIBUTING.md ceremonies/*.md src/cli/agents/*.md 2>/dev/null | md5sum); if [ "$BEFORE" != "$AFTER" ]; then npm run docs:sync; fi; done
scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs:sync && npx concurrently --kill-others 'npm run docs:watch' 'vitepress dev _docs'

author: Nacho Coll
